get.description: Returns a sample response for listing domains.

post.description: Creates a new domain with automatic partition creation.

get.description: Returns a list of posts for the specified domain.

post.description: Creates a new post in the specified domain.

get.description: Returns the details of a post by UUID within the specified domain.

put.description: Modifies the details of a post by UUID within the specified domain.

delete.description: Removes a post by UUID from the specified domain.

get.description: Returns a list of roles for the specified domain.

post.description: Creates a new role in the specified domain.

get.description: Returns the details of a role by UUID within the specified domain.

put.description: Modifies the details of a role by UUID within the specified domain.

delete.description: Removes a role by UUID from the specified domain.

get.description: Returns a list of users for the specified domain.

post.description: Creates a new user in the specified domain.

get.description: Returns the details of a user by UUID within the specified domain.

put.description: Modifies the details of a user by UUID within the specified domain.

delete.description: Removes a user by UUID from the specified domain.

get.description: Redirects user to GitHub OAuth for authentication
Processes the OAuth callback from GitHub and authenticates the user
Redirects user to Google OAuth for authentication
Processes the OAuth callback from Google and authenticates the user

post.description: Perform user login with email and password. The returned `accessToken` should be used as a Bearer token in the `Authorization` header (i.e., `Authorization: Bearer <accessToken>`) for authenticated endpoints such as Logout.
post.summary: Authenticates a user using email and password, and returns a token pair if successful.

post.description: RefreshToken issues a new access token using a valid refresh token.
Register creates a new user and domain based on the provided registration request.

ApiKeyAuth.description: Provide the accessToken as a Bearer token: 'Bearer {accessToken}'
ApiKeyAuth.name: Authorization
